name: RISE for Equity: Reflect, Inspire, Strengthen and Empower
content: Prioritizing and addressing diversity, equity and inclusion in workforce development and organizational culture is essential to providing optimal patient care, achieving health equity, and attracting and engaging the workforce of the future. At this groundbreaking CME course, participants join a national healthcare dialogue on this important subject and explore evidence-based solutions and innovative initiatives. Keynote presentations by leading experts and panel discussions cover health disparities, digital equity and much more. It meets the professional needs of healthcare providers, social workers, nurses, hiring managers, HR professionals, supervisors, hospital leadership and administration, healthcare educators, and diversity and inclusion practitioners. Time: 8:00 am to 12:55 pm Venue details: Hyatt Regency Minneapolis, 1300 Nicollet Mall, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 55403, United States Prices: General Session (LIVE in person): USD 950.00, General Session (Livestream): USD 799.00
organizers: Mayo Clinic School of Continuous Professional Development
